testcase.classname: Grant application process through Business Grant Portal
testcase.name: Submit an application to apply for grant
testcase.system-out: Given I am on business grant portal landing page............................passed And I click login with CorpPass to opt apply for a grant now option.........passed When I login with own user details..........................................passed And I select "Get New Grant" on the "My Grants" dashboard to enter the Grant Picker.passed And I select a sector "IT" for my business..................................passed And I select a development area "Bring my business overseas"................passed And I select a functional area "Market Readiness Assistance" and apply for a grant.passed And I click "Proceed" to enter the form.....................................passed Then I expect an application form should consists following sections........passed And I expect the "Eligibility" section should contain below questions.......passed And I expect question "Are all the following statements true for this project?" is present with below statements.passed And I expect each question in "Eligibility" section should be answered Yes or No through radio buttons.passed And I expect a warning message "The applicant may not meet the eligibility criteria for this grant. Visit FAQ page for more information on other government grants." to be displayed if any question is answered as No.passed And I expect clicking "Save" should save applicant's input in "Eligibility" section and refreshing the page should reload the saved values.passed And I expect a "Main Contact Person" subsection with following inputs in "Contact Details" section.passed And I expect entering a valid postal code "542299" should auto-populate "Blk/Hse No." and "Street" details with below valid values.passed And I expect enabling a checkbox "Same as registered address in Company Profile" should auto-populate "mailing address" details with below values.passed And I expect a "Letter Of Offer Addressee" subsection with following inputs in "Contact Details" section.passed And I fill "Main Contact Person" subsection with following values...........passed And I expect enabling a checkbox "Same as main contact person" should auto-populate "Letter Of Offer Addressee" details with below values.passed And I expect clicking "Save" should save applicant's input in "Contact Details" section and refreshing the page should reload the saved values.passed And I fill "Proposal" section with following values.........................passed And I fill "Business Impact" section with following values..................passed And I fill "Cost" section with following values.............................passed And I acknowledge terms in "Declare & Review" section and I expect "1" validation error and the form should redirect to the "Cost" section with the missing details if mandatory input "Name of Vendor" is missing with value "INTEST PTE. LTD.".passed And I expect clicking "Review" button in "Declare & Review" section should redirect applicant to read-only summary page.passed And I expect read-only summary page should correctly contain all the details previously filled in each form section menioned below.passed And I expect a checkbox "Consent and Acknowledgement" at the bottom of read-only summary page.passed And On submission of an application form I expect a success message "Your application has been submitted." with reference id and receiving agency should be "Enterprise Singapore".passed And I expect "My Grants" dashboard should show the application under the "Processing" tab with project title "Participate in Trade Fair".passed

testcase.classname: Grant application process through Business Grant Portal
testcase.name: Verify non submitted application in Drafts tab
testcase.system-out: Given I am on business grant portal landing page............................passed And I click login with CorpPass to opt apply for a grant now option.........passed When I login with own user details..........................................passed And I select "Get New Grant" on the "My Grants" dashboard to enter the Grant Picker.passed And I select a sector "IT" for my business..................................passed And I select a development area "Bring my business overseas"................passed And I select a functional area "Market Readiness Assistance" and apply for a grant.passed And I click "Proceed" to enter the form.....................................passed And I fill "Proposal" section with following values.........................passed And I expect "My Grants" dashboard should show the application under the "Drafts" tab with project title "Participate in Murex Fair".passed
